attributes.comment:
As supporters of adoption, my husband and I are deeply concerned about the potential increase in
fees for those attempting to adopt. Each year, we pay slightly less than half our income in taxes
and from the remaining 57% we donate to organizations that provide grants to couples who wish to
adopt. It is more than a little frustating to know that a significant portion of the grant monies
received will then go back to the government rather than to organizations actually providing orphan
care. It is our hope that by increasing the efficiency of the USCIS, these cost increases will be
unnecessary.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Rhonda Bowers
